column4: anybody know of a way that i can sync usernames & password for linux, samba, nfs, & such?
you can also configure samba and nfs to use pam authentication
which means they would use whatever passwords are set for each user
yeah, I'm fairly certain it will, and it would be a lot easier than setting up an ldap server just for that... you'll have to look into the docs for the samba and nfs configs
